title: Enhancing Learning Design Practical Competencies: Language Learning Optimization Through Analysis of Online Lecture Format Effectiveness

context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can comparatively analyze the effectiveness of three or more online lecture formats (audio, audio+text, audio+instructor visuals).
Learners can quantify attention levels (mind-wandering frequency) and comprehension test results by lecture format.
Learners can select the optimal lecture format for language learning purposes with 85% accuracy.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
